item.description: A group dedicated to 45+ Singles in RI, and some out of state activities,  who want to take advantage of their limited free time by enjoying a special day or night out. The timing is perfect to make new friends and cultivate new relationships. Our goal is to provide an inviting forum to foster companionship and yes... potential new romances. We are planning dinners, dancing, and travel events at local hotspots such as the The Knickerbocker Cafe,  The Narragansett cafe,The Providence Tango Mill, The Towers in Naragansett,  Providence Proformaning Arts, Trips to Boston, NYC, and many other great places. Many dances are planned for swing, and Cajun, Zydeco which is very fun and easy to learn so join and learn. most places we go give lessons. As always we are open to suggestions for venues from our esteemed members. Singles preferred.
item.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing
